Package edu.biu.scapi.comm

Interface Summary
Channel This interface represents a connection between two parties.
ConnectivitySuccessVerifier Different Multi-parties computations may require different types of success when checking the connections between all the parties that were supposed to participate.
Protocol For future implementation.
ProtocolInput For future implementation.
ProtocolOutput For future implementation.
Role For future implementation.
 

Class Summary
AuthenticatedChannel This channel ensures UnlimitedTimes security level.
ChannelDecorator We use the Decorator Pattern in order to add features to the basic Channel.
CliqueSuccess For future implementation.
CommunicationSetup The CommunicationSetup class is the heart of the Communications Layer.
EncryptedChannel This channel ensures CPA security level.
LoadParties Utility class for reading a list of parties from some file.
NaiveSuccess NaiveSuccess does not actually check the connections but rather always returns true.
Party An immutable class that holds data for a very basic party that can participate in an MPC.
PlainChannel  
PlainTCPChannel This class represents a concrete channel in the Decorator Pattern used to create Channels.
PlainTCPChannel.Message A nested class to use in the send and receive functions.
SecureCliqueSuccess For future implementation.
TwoPartiesSuccess For future implementation.
 

Enum Summary
PlainChannel.State
